summary: This document is a billing statement from AT&T Wireless for Martin Golick's account, detailing monthly charges, payments, and usage for the billing cycle from October 15, 2004, to November 14, 2004. It includes a summary of charges, adjustments, and voice usage details. This document contains detailed records of voice usage and call activity associated with an account belonging to Martin Golick. It includes timestamps, call durations, and locations for various incoming and outgoing calls, primarily from locations in Florida. This document contains detailed records of voice usage and charges associated with the account of Martin Golick, dated November 17, 2004. It includes call logs with timestamps, durations, and locations, primarily focusing on calls made to and from Palm Beach, Florida, and other nearby areas. This document contains detailed records of voice usage and text/multimedia messages associated with an account, likely related to communications involving Epstein or his associates. It includes timestamps, durations, and charge descriptions for various calls and messages, indicating a pattern of communication over several days.

persons.name: Martin Golick
persons.context: Martin Golick is identified as the account holder for the AT&T Wireless account referenced in the document.
